<S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H4448>say<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [things,] And the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be a <S%H3524>mighty<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
"Does <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> does the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H6664>what<s%> is <S%H6664>right<s%>?
<S%H518>"If<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Him, Then He <S%H7971>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>power<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> you would <S%H7836>seek<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> And <S%H2603>implore<s%> the <S%H2603>compassion<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you are <S%H2134>pure<s%> and <S%H3477>upright,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> He would <S%H5782>rouse<s%> Himself for you And <S%H9608>restore<s%> your <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H5116>estate.<s%>
"Though your <S%H7225>beginning<s%> was <S%H4705>insignificant,<s%> Yet your <S%H319>end<s%> will <S%H7685>increase<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>
<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of <S%H7223>past<s%> <S%H1755>generations,<s%> And <S%H3559>consider<s%> the <S%H2714>things<s%> <S%H2714>searched<s%> out by their fathers.
"For we are [only] of <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>nothing,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> on <S%H776>earth<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>
"Will they not <S%H3384>teach<s%> you [and] <S%H559>tell<s%> you, And <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%> from their <S%H3820>minds<s%>?
"Can the <S%H1573>papyrus<s%> <S%H1342>grow<s%> up <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1207>marsh<s%>? Can the <S%H260>rushes<s%> <S%H7685>grow<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>?
"While it is <S%H5750>still<s%> green [and] not <S%H3>cut<s%> <S%H6998>down,<s%> Yet it <S%H6998>withers<s%> <S%H3001>before<s%> <S%H6440>any<s%> [other] <S%H3605>plant.<s%>
<S%H3651>"So<s%> are the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7911>who<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> And the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H2611>godless<s%> will perish,
<S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H3689>confidence<s%> is <S%H9511>fragile,<s%> And whose <S%H4009>trust<s%> a spider's <S%H1004>web.<s%>
"He <S%H8172>trusts<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> but it does not <S%H5975>stand;<s%> He <S%H2388>holds<s%> <S%H2388>fast<s%> to it, but it does not <S%H6965>endure.<s%>
"He <S%H7373>thrives<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> And his <S%H3127>shoots<s%> <S%H3318>spread<s%> out <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H1593>garden.<s%>
"His <S%H8328>roots<s%> <S%H5440>wrap<s%> <S%H5440>around<s%> a <S%H1530>rock<s%> <S%H1530>pile,<s%> He <S%H270>grasps<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H68>stones.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> he is <S%H1104>removed<s%> from his <S%H4725>place,<s%> Then it will <S%H3584>deny<s%> him, [saying,] 'I <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> you.'
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of His <S%H1870>way;<s%> And out of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H312>others<s%> will <S%H6779>spring.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Lo,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will not <S%H3988>reject<s%> [a man of] <S%H8535>integrity,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will He <S%H2388>support<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H7489>evildoers.<s%>
"He will <S%H5704>yet<s%> <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> And your <S%H8193>lips<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting.<s%>
"Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you will be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame;<s%> And the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> more."
